QueryDefinition.Query: select a.patid as person_id, a.evdate as procedure_date, a.OPCS as procedure_source_value, case when a.p_order=1 then 38000184 when a.p_order=2 then 38000185 when a.p_order=3 then 38000186 when a.p_order=4 then 38000187 when a.p_order=5 then 38000188 when a.p_order=6 then 38000189 when a.p_order=7 then 38000190 when a.p_order=8 then 38000191 when a.p_order=9 then 38000192 when a.p_order=10 then 38000193 when a.p_order=11 then 38000194 when a.p_order=12 then 38000195 when a.p_order=13 then 38000196 when a.p_order=14 then 38000197 when a.p_order=15 then 38000198 when a.p_order=16 then 44818709 when a.p_order=17 then 44818710 when a.p_order=18 then 44818711 when a.p_order=19 then 44818712 else 44818713 end as PROCEDURE_TYPE_CONCEPT_ID, b.spno as visit_occurrence_id, b.pconsult, ';' + b.pconsult ProviderIdKey from HES_procedures_epi a JOIN _chunks ch ON ch.ChunkId = {0} AND a.patid = ch.PERSON_ID join hes_episodes b on a.patid=b.patid and a.epikey=b.epikey where a.evdate is not null
